definitions.definition: A document issued by some authority , creating a public or private institution , and defining its purposes and privileges .
A similar document conferring rights and privileges on a person , corporation etc.
A contract for the commercial leasing of a vessel , or space on a vessel.
The temporary hiring or leasing of a vehicle .
A special privilege, immunity, or exemption.
a provision whose unintended consequence would be to encourage an undesirable activity
labels: in a noun phrase with another noun which is either an agent or action
definitions.label_groups: UK , derogatory , in a noun phrase with another noun which is either an agent or action

main_definition: A document issued by some authority , creating a public or private institution , and defining its purposes and privileges .
secondary_definitions: A similar document conferring rights and privileges on a person , corporation etc.
A contract for the commercial leasing of a vessel , or space on a vessel.
The temporary hiring or leasing of a vehicle .
A special privilege, immunity, or exemption.
( UK , derogatory , in a noun phrase with another noun which is either an agent or action ) a provision whose unintended consequence would be to encourage an undesirable activity
